---
title: "Frequencies"
output: html_notebook
---

- Calculation of absolute frequencies <br> `table(x)`
- Calculation of relative frequencies <br>`prop.table(table(x))`
- Classification can be created with the functions `cut()` and `seq()`
    <br> `cut()` creats the Groups, `seq()` creats the boarders, from which to which the Groups should be made and
    `right = FALSE` makes the right boarder open.

- marginal frequncies <br>`addmargins(x)`
